description: A dressing with Italian mixed herbs to add a wow factor to your salads.
name: Cafe Italian Salad Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When you're ready to use the dressing, for extra colour and zing mix some of the salad dressing with some of the chopped chives and fresh chopped parsley. Set aside for 1 hour for the onion to mellow but gives the dressing an added kick of WOW.
